original_text: Offer to me the proper grain offering with each animal. Mix together 3 kilograms of the best flour with olive oil. Offer it to me with the young bull. Offer 2 kilograms of flour with oil with the male sheep.
korean_text: 그 소제로는 고운 가루에 기름을 섞어서 쓰되 수송아지에는 십분의 삼이요 숫양에는 십분의 이요

sentences.original_text: Offer to me the proper grain offering
Mix together 3 kilograms of the best flour
Offer it to me with the young bull
sentences.korean_translation: 그것을 어린 수소와 함께 나에게 드리라

sentences.original_text: Offer 2 kilograms of flour with oil
